H0.text: Who was the first man to walk on the Moon. Buzz Aldrin

H1.text: Who was the first man to walk on the Moon. Pete Conrad

H2.text: Who was the first man to walk on the Moon. Alan Shepard

H3.text: Who was the first man to walk on the Moon. Neil Armstrong

A4.text: On July 20, 1969, Armstrong and Apollo 11 Lunar Module (LM) pilot Buzz Aldrin became the first people to land on the Moon

A5.text: About 19 minutes after Armstrong's first step, Aldrin joined him on the surface, becoming the second human to walk on the Moon
